title: Settled Accounts | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Settled Accounts | Joel Osteen
description:
We all have to deal with unfair situations, but you are not at the mercy of how other people have treated you. You won’t have to vindicate yourself—the Most High God is going to settle your accounts. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
